He has endured rigorous conditioning to control this power, choosing to remain totally silent. Only in defense of his people does Black Bolt unleash this power of his destructive voice.

Medusaligh Amaquelin-Boltagon, or Medusa, is the wife of Black Bolt and queen of the Inhumans. Through exposure to the Terrigen mists, she gained psychokinetic control over her hair. Each strand is stronger than steel and she can manipulate them like an array of countless appendages. She can whip her hair faster than the speed of sound or use it to bind someone in place. Medusa's control of her hair is so precise that she can use it to perform work as delicate as picking a lock or threading a needle.

Contents:
1 Black Bolt Miniature
1 Medusa Miniature
2 Bases
2 Character Stat Cards
4 Team Tactic Cards
1 Crisis Card
1 Affiliation Card
12 Tokens

Name: Marvel: Crisis Protocol – Crystal and Lockjaw
Description:
Crystalia Amaquelin is a princess of the Inhuman Royal Family and younger sister of Medusa, the Queen of the Inhumans. Like other Inhumans, Crystal was exposed to the Terrigen Mists at a young age to gain powers through Terrigenesis, acquiring the ability to psionically control the classic elements of air, earth, fire, and water. Crystal is often accompanied by her loyal companion, Lockjaw.

Lockjaw is a giant Inhuman bull dog with the power of incredible teleportation. He serves the Inhuman Royal Family as an escort and loyal protector-as well as a means of transportation. Lockjaw can teleport himself and those nearby anywhere he desires on the Earth or Moon. Lockjaw can also psionically track scents across dimensions and has an empathic bond to those he protects. If his wards are ever in danger, Lockjaw fiercely protects them with his incredible strength.

Contents:
1 Crystal Miniature
1 Lockjaw Miniature
2 Bases
2 Character Stat Cards
2 Team Tactic Cards
11 Tokens

Name: Plantel
Description:
In Football Season, players take on the role of managers of a football club and need to control various aspects of the team such as hiring players, lineup, training, medical department and also taking care of the team's image. Over the course of 4 seasons the teams will dispute the national championship and fight for the title, but the opponents are not easy and it will be necessary to invest in the right areas to have the best team of all time.

Choose your starting 11, face the best teams in the tournament, but watch out for injuries that can take your ace off the field. Invest in a good coach or improve your training conditions, send scouts to attract new talents and even compete in the Cup for chances to increase your income. In the end, the best manager will be the one who has achieved the most success with his new club.

—description from the designer

Name: Alsa Ludo
Description:
With Alsa Ludo, rediscover alone, with family or friends, the cultural riches of Alsace, by playing with 160 puzzle cards with detailed statements.

Among the many topics covered; Castles of Alsace & Alsatian Traditions: construction and specificities of many castles, famous people or families, significant events, village festivals, local law, gastronomy, costume, dialect, legends, tourist routes, music...

Object of the game: reach 10 points!

Name: One Page WWII: Tank War Ardennes
Description:
Cadet!
 You are a tank commander during the Battle of the Bulge in WWII. 
The Ardennes forest is a harsh climate, and the cold December timing of the battle is sure to try you and your crew. 
Your orders are to sweep the area for German units and drive them back, clearing the way for the Allies to invade Germany and END THIS WAR!

One Page WWII: Tank War Ardennes is a solitaire roll and write wargame where you record everything on a single sheet of paper.

—description from the publisher
Families: History: World War II (Battle of the Bulge)

Name: Magnytour Profil: Championnat d'Europe
Description:
190 km of flat is on the program in 2019 for the title.

Theoretically, it's an ultra-flat profile in the Netherlands which should allow sprinters to become European champions, but beware of the verges.

Name: Carbondale
Description:
Carbondale is a tile-laying game played with standard playing cards. Players have just moved to the small town of Carbondale, and lay cards in a grid representing the social and business networks they are working to develop. By playing clubs, they can win hearts; by buying spades, they can gain diamonds. The winner is the first to have in their networks three hearts and seven diamonds, or three diamonds and seven hearts. If a card in a player's network is not sufficiently protected, it is vulnerable to take-over by opponents. Players will need skill in tile-laying to advance quickly and safely, and will have to carefully manage their hand to balance cards for offense, defense, and building.

The only equipment required is standard decks of cards.

—description from the designer

Name: Black Card Revoked: Still Petty Edition
Description:
Black Card Revoked: Still Petty Edition is a 36-card expansion for any edition of Black Card Revoked created in partnership with website The Shade Room.

Petty (2017) / Still Petty (2018) - Expansion packs with cards dedicated to all-around pettiness, celebrity tea spilling, and shade throwing, Still Petty edition contains 36 new cards. Example photos show different cards in each set. Both sets were on sale at the same time. Originally called Petty edition.

Name: Stronghold: Undead (Second Edition) – Phantom Dragon Expansion
Description:
Use Phantom Dragon to destroy the gate for alternate win condition: Destroying the third gate equals breaching the stronghold and fulfilling the Invader's Victory condition.

As a necromancer you will be able to raise the most powerful of your units, The Phantom Dragon. He will be beating down on Stronghold's newfound gates, making it another possible route to victory. It will not stop. Each time you will put mana into summoning it, it will grow stronger. However, that's not the only way Phantom Dragon grows. He will be also powered up by panic on the walls. For ever point on panic marker this creature will grow stronger.

This expansion is a redesigned version of the old rules for Gate from the first edition of the game. It includes new rules for Invader and Defender side.

So brace for impact poor souls inside a stronghold, because the real nightmare just started.


Note: Although it was delivered in a small separate box, one of its components (a big gate token, which would not fit in this small box) was included INSIDE the KS edition of the base game.
